r2dii.plot 0.0.0.9000

Get the predefined technology colors for a sector

Source: R/2dii_colours.R
get_r2dii_technology_colours.Rd

Get the predefined technology colors for a sector

get_r2dii_technology_colours(sector)

Arguments

sector

Sector for which we want to retrieve colors (character string).

See also

Other colour datasets: r2dii_palette_colours(), r2dii_scenario_colours, r2dii_sector_colours()

Examples

get_r2dii_technology_colours("power")

#> # A tibble: 6 x 3
#>   technology    label               colour 
#>   <chr>         <chr>               <chr>  
#> 1 coalcap       Coal Capacity       #7A2701
#> 2 oilcap        Oil Capacity        #a63603
#> 3 gascap        Gas Capacity        #e6550d
#> 4 nuclearcap    Nuclear Capacity    #fd8d3c
#> 5 hydrocap      Hydro Capacity      #fdbe85
#> 6 renewablescap Renewables Capacity #ffd4ad
